item.title: Use prompt to enhance your propmt
item.description:
Analyze the following prompt idea: [insert prompt idea]~Rewrite the prompt for clarity and effectiveness~Identify potential improvements or additions~Refine the prompt based on identified improvements~Present the final optimized prompt

Example:

Input:

Analyze the following prompt idea: [You are an experienced financial analyst and investment advisor. Please develop a long-term investment strategy for a 30-year-old professional. This individual has an annual income of $100,000, with $50,000 available for immediate investment, and plans to invest an additional $1,000 monthly. They have a moderate risk tolerance and aim to prepare for retirement in 25-30 years. Provide specific asset allocation recommendations, including stocks, bonds, ETFs, and other potential investment vehicles. Explain the rationale behind your recommendations and discuss the potential risks and returns of this strategy.]Rewrite the prompt for clarity and effectivenessIdentify potential improvements or additionsRefine the prompt based on identified improvementsPresent the final optimized prompt
